section.title: Adding Event Handlers to a Test Case
section.para: This section deals with adding Event Handlers to Test Cases.

listitem.para: Open the Test Case Editor by double-clicking on the Test Case you want to edit in the Test Case Browser.
from the context-sensitive menu in the editor or use »CTRL+ENTER«.
Choose a Test Case to add from the dialog that appears.
You can also drag the Test Case you want to use straight into the Event Handlers area of at the bottom of th the Test Case Editor.
You can’t add a Test Case to itself as an Event Handler, because this would create an infinite loop.
You can optionally add a name for the Event Handler that will be used as the referenced name for this Event Handler.
Select an event type from the combo box ().
Select a reentry type from the combo box ().
For each Test Case you can only add one Event Handler for each event type.

The Event Handler
appears in the lower half of the Test Case Editor.
Save the changes in the editor.
